request.description:
Generated from cURL: curl --location 'http://localhost:8083/v1/auth/register/' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/json' \
--data-raw '{
    "username": "amir.arabzadeh888@gmail.com",
    "password": "testpass123",
    "firstName": "Amir",
    "lastName": "Arabzadeh",
    "phoneNumber": "1234567890",
    "email": "amir.arabzadeh888@gmail.com",
    "role": "USER"
}'

Generated from cURL: curl -X GET http://localhost:8080/v1/auth/validate \
     -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
     -H "Authorization: Bearer yourToken"

Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:8081/auth/verify' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--data-urlencode 'token=123456'

Generated from cURL: curl --location --request POST 'http://localhost:8081/auth/verify' \
--header 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded' \
--data-urlencode 'token=123456'

Generated from cURL: curl --location 'http://localhost:8083/v1/product' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer your-token' \
--form 'product="{
    \"title\":\"Test Product\",
    \"description\":\"Detailed product description\",
    \"price\":{
        \"amount\":100000,
        \"unit\":\"TOMAN\"
    },
    \"category\":\"Electronics\",
    \"productionYear\":2023,
    \"brand\":\"Test Brand\",
    \"sellerId\":7
}"' \
--form 'images=@"/path/to/image.jpg"'

Generated from cURL: curl --location 'http://localhost:8083/v1/product/1' \
--header 'Authorization: Bearer your-token'

Generated from cURL: curl -X PUT 'http://localhost:8083/v1/product/{product_id}' \
-H 'Authorization: YOUR_JWT_TOKEN' \
-H 'Content-Type: multipart/form-data' \
-F 'product={
  "title": "Updated Product Title",
  "description": "Updated product description",
  "price": {
    "amount": 1000.00,
    "unit": "TOMAN"
  },
  "category": "electronics",
  "productionYear": 2024,
  "brand": "SampleBrand"
}' \
-F 'images=@/path/to/image1.jpg' \
-F 'images=@/path/to/image2.jpg'

Generated from cURL: curl -X DELETE 'http://localhost:8083/v1/product/1' \
-H 'Authorization: YOUR_AUTH_TOKEN'
